languages.text: {n}Его голос становится прерывистым, словно дознавателю не хватает воздуха.{/n} "Если бы я был внимательнее, собраннее... но нет. Я отвлекся. Решил, что я... что ты... не помешаем тому, что мне должно исполнять. Моей работе. Но вместо этого... я позволил себе потерять фокус. Ты вытеснила из моего сознания все то, что некогда занимало его без остатка".

traits.locale_text: {n}Его голос становится прерывистым, словно дознавателю не хватает воздуха.{/n} "Если бы я был внимательнее, собраннее... но нет. Я отвлекся. Решил, что я... что ты... не помешаем тому, что мне должно исполнять. Моей работе. Но вместо этого... я позволил себе потерять фокус. Ты вытеснила из моего сознания все то, что некогда занимало его без остатка".

languages.text: {n}His voice becomes ragged, as though he is not getting enough air.{/n} "If I'd paid more attention, had more self-control... but no. I allowed myself to be distracted. I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."

Решил, что я... что ты... не помешаем тому, что мне должно исполнять. Моей работе. Но вместо этого... я позволил себе потерять фокус. Ты вытеснила из моего сознания все то, что некогда занимало его без остатка".

I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."

{n}His voice becomes ragged, as though he is not getting enough air.{/n} "If I'd paid more attention, had more self-control... but no. I allowed myself to be distracted. I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."

languages.text: {n}他的声音嘶哑，仿佛已经无法呼吸到足够的空气。{/n}“如果我当初能多加留意，能更好地控制自己……可我失败了。我让我自己分心了，我以为我……我以为你……我以为我们不会妨碍我的任务，我的工作。可恰恰相反……我无法再集中心智了。我脑中曾填满的一切，如今全都变成了你的身影。”
languages.original_text: {n}His voice becomes ragged, as though he is not getting enough air.{/n} "If I'd paid more attention, had more self-control... but no. I allowed myself to be distracted. I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}他的声音嘶哑，仿佛已经无法呼吸到足够的空气。{/n}“如果我当初能多加留意，能更好地控制自己……可我失败了。我让我自己分心了，我以为我……我以为你……我以为我们不会妨碍我的任务，我的工作。可恰恰相反……我无法再集中心智了。我脑中曾填满的一切，如今全都变成了你的身影。”

languages.text: {n}Su voz se rasga como si le faltara aire.{/n} «Si hubiera prestado más atención y hubiera tenido más autocontrol... Pero no. Me dejé distraer. Pensaba que yo... que usted... que lo nuestro no interferiría en mi misión. En mi trabajo. Pero... me he descentrado. Ahora es usted lo único que ocupa mi mente».
languages.original_text: {n}His voice becomes ragged, as though he is not getting enough air.{/n} "If I'd paid more attention, had more self-control... but no. I allowed myself to be distracted. I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Su voz se rasga como si le faltara aire.{/n} «Si hubiera prestado más atención y hubiera tenido más autocontrol... Pero no. Me dejé distraer. Pensaba que yo... que usted... que lo nuestro no interferiría en mi misión. En mi trabajo. Pero... me he descentrado. Ahora es usted lo único que ocupa mi mente».

languages.text: {n}その声は、まるで十分な空気を吸っていないかのように荒くなる。{/n}「俺がもっと注意を払い、もっと自制ができていれば…だが、そうはならなかったんだ。俺は、己の散漫を許してしまった。俺は…あなたは…俺らの使命の邪魔にならないと思った。だが代わりに…俺は、己の集中を失ってしまった。あなたが、かつて俺の集中力を保っていた部分を占めてしまったんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}His voice becomes ragged, as though he is not getting enough air.{/n} "If I'd paid more attention, had more self-control... but no. I allowed myself to be distracted. I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}その声は、まるで十分な空気を吸っていないかのように荒くなる。{/n}「俺がもっと注意を払い、もっと自制ができていれば…だが、そうはならなかったんだ。俺は、己の散漫を許してしまった。俺は…あなたは…俺らの使命の邪魔にならないと思った。だが代わりに…俺は、己の集中を失ってしまった。あなたが、かつて俺の集中力を保っていた部分を占めてしまったんだ」

languages.text: {n}Comme s'il commençait à manquer d'air, sa voix se fait plus rauque.{/n} « Si j'avais été plus attentif, si j'étais capable de mieux me maîtriser... mais non. Je me suis laissé distraire. J'ai cru que je... que vous... que nous ne serions pas un obstacle à ma mission. Mon travail. Mais au bout du compte... je me suis permis de perdre ma concentration. Vous occupez toutes mes pensées. »
languages.original_text: {n}His voice becomes ragged, as though he is not getting enough air.{/n} "If I'd paid more attention, had more self-control... but no. I allowed myself to be distracted. I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."

traits.locale_text: {n}Comme s'il commençait à manquer d'air, sa voix se fait plus rauque.{/n} « Si j'avais été plus attentif, si j'étais capable de mieux me maîtriser... mais non. Je me suis laissé distraire. J'ai cru que je... que vous... que nous ne serions pas un obstacle à ma mission. Mon travail. Mais au bout du compte... je me suis permis de perdre ma concentration. Vous occupez toutes mes pensées. »

languages.text: {n}Er beginnt zu röcheln, als würde er nicht genug Luft bekommen.{/n}"Wenn ich doch nur aufmerksamer gewesen wäre oder mehr Selbstbeherrschung gehabt hätte ... aber nein. Ich habe mich ablenken lassen. Ich dachte, dass ich ... dass Ihr ... dass wir meiner Mission nicht im Weg stehen würden. Meiner Arbeit. Stattdessen ... Habe ich meinen Fokus verloren. Ihr habt alles verdrängt, was mich zuvor voll und ganz beschäftigt hat."
languages.original_text: {n}His voice becomes ragged, as though he is not getting enough air.{/n} "If I'd paid more attention, had more self-control... but no. I allowed myself to be distracted. I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."

I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."

languages.text: {n}Sesi, yeterince nefes alamıyormuş gibi ahenksiz çıkıyor.{/n} "Daha dikkatli olsaydım, kendime daha hâkim olsaydım... Ama hayır. Kafamın karışmasına izin verdim. Düşündüm ki benim... Senin... Yani bizim; misyonuma, işime mâni olmayacağımızı sandım ama onun yerine... Odağımı kaybetmeye göz yumdum. Sen, bir vakitler zihnimi tamamen meşgul eden her şeyin yerini aldın."
languages.original_text: {n}His voice becomes ragged, as though he is not getting enough air.{/n} "If I'd paid more attention, had more self-control... but no. I allowed myself to be distracted. I thought that I... that you... that we wouldn't get in the way of my mission. My work. But instead... I allowed myself to lose focus. You supplanted everything that once fully occupied my mind."
